summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5990 for the improvement of East 88th Street and East 89th Street, each from 15th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80250, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
